labelsets.name: Cluster
labelsets.description: The coarse level of cell type definition in the mouse whole brain taxonomy. All cells within a supertype belong to the same subclass. Subclass groups together related supertypes.

labelsets.name: SubClass
labelsets.description: The coarse level of cell type definition in the mouse whole brain taxonomy. All cells within a supertype belong to the same subclass. Subclass groups together related supertypes.

labelsets.name: NT
labelsets.description: neurotransmitter, inferred from gene expression. Value must be one of 'Glu, GABA, Gly, Ser, Dop'
